========================================================

Retrieve data on German Federal States:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(datamart) # version 0.5 or later
dbp <- dbpedia(lang = "en")
# see a list of predefined queries
queries(dbp)
# lists Federal States
head(query(dbp, "Nuts1"))[, c("name", "nuts", "gdp")
```
